verbose_text: There are few studies in humans associating vitamin D and chronic inflammatory status of T2DM patients, however, the evidence suggests that vitamin D can improve insulin sensitivity and promote pancreatic beta-cell survival by modulating the effects of cytokines and nuclear transcription factors such as NF-kappaB [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: vitamin D can improve insulin sensitivity and promote pancreatic beta-cell survival by modulating the effects of cytokines and nuclear transcription
